entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:52 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
